downloadTitle: Azure Active Directory Solutions Architecture White Paper
downloadDescription: This white paper describes the Microsoft Azure Active Directory Identity and Access Management solutions offered to customers of Azure, Office 365, Intune, Microsoft CRM and all Microsoft Online services.
detailsSection: This document describes the Azure Active Directory Identity and Access Management solutions offered to customers of Azure, Office 365, Intune, Microsoft CRM and all Microsoft Online services.  It also describes the solutions that integrate on-premises Active Directory services and Azure Active Directory.
systemRequirementsSection: Microsoft Office Word and/or Adobe Reader
installInstructionSection: Download and Open the document using Microsoft Office Word or Download the PDF version, and use Adobe Reader
